doc.field: Series XXIII: Pride and Progress / The Right Stuff
Series XXIII: Pride and Progress / The Right Stuff
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 11 [2]--The Right Stuff [Air Date: 3/6/1987]
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 11 [2]--The Right Stuff [Air Date: 3/6/1987]

Pride and ProgressNews-highlights:1. Gay Week in Review, with Andy Humm, Darrell Yates Rist, and Jim Levin, sponsored by the Human Rights Campaign Fund2. Short news stories3. Discussion of the Center for Disease Control Conference in Atlanta, and the growing nuance in AIDS discussionCOMMERCIAL: SF AIDS Foundation4. Discussion of the radical Lavender Hill Mob movement and its public disturbance as a protest methodCOMMERCIAL: "First Hand" gay magazine5. Andy Humm on the conflict between organized religion and homosexuality6. News Watch, Delaware State Insurance Commission approves gay-sensitive health insurance guidelines7. Chicago, "gay dollar" stamps now sold by mail8. National Gay Rights Advocates publish a tax guide for gay and lesbian men and women9. California's State Association of Health calls for the isolated quarantining of those who are AIDS and HIV positive and are willfully spreading the virus10. Sports Report, interview with two members of the Big Apple Softball LeagueCOMMERCIAL: Night of a Thousand Gowns charity drag ball11. Lavender Health, interview with John Thacker, director of the NYC Department of Health's Sexually Transmitted Disease Education Service12. Closing credits
The Right Stuff:1. This Week in Gay History, with Jeff BixbyCOMMERCIAL: Zamir Furs2. Media Watch with Brandon Judell, interview with actor Taylor Mead, clips from Andy Warhol's "Frankenstein"3. Show Bits with George Trahanis, review of "Mona Rogers in Person," with clipsCOMMERCIAL: Night of a Thousand Gowns charity drag ball4. Interview series on the operating methods of GMHC, with playwright Larry Kramer, and a response by the executive director of GMHC, Richard Dunne5. Closing credits over the end of Dunne's response which is cut off
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 11 [2]--The Right Stuff [Air Date: 3/6/1987]: March 1987
